name: Ubuntu server LTS (2204)
description: Operation system underlying kubernetes cluster

name: Docker (docker-shim)
description: Kubernetes has remove this connector since v1.24 but this connector very stable

name: Docker-Mirantis (cri-dockerd)
description: Alternative docker-shim connector for kubernetes cluster since the status has been removed, but only work on specific operation system such ubuntu 2204

name: Containerd v1.6.x
description:
Default container runtime for kubernetes cluster for 1.24 or later but there is any problems like:
  • When container image pull sometime failed because failed unpacked
  • Container logs sometime can't read

name: Containerd v1.7.x
description: Default container runtime for kubernetes cluster for 1.24 or later

name: CRI-O
description: Container runtime alternative containerd, but has problem pod logs not show properly

name: github.com/flannel-io/flannel v0.21.4
description: Default networking for kubernetes cluster v1.24 or later

name: tigera.io/project-calico v3.25.0
description: More advanced networking for kubernetes cluster v1.24 or later

name: MetalLB v0.13.9
description: Loadbalancer on kubernetes cluster for on-premise and has deferent implementation (BGP, and Layer2)

name: Kubernetes Dashboard UI
description: Alternative access kubernetes using webapp

name: cert-manager
description: letsencrypt can be generate certificate automaticly in kubernetes cluaster for ingress

name: Nginx Ingress (community)
description: Ingress controler free edition support by kubernetes community

name: Nginx Ingress (f5)
description: Ingress controler support by nginx f5, free edition available

name: Nginx Ingress (f5)
description: Ingress controler support by nginx f5, free edition available

name: jaeger-operator
description: Distribute tracing for container workload

name: metrics-server
description: Enable metrics resource (cpu, memory) from node and pod

name: istio
description: Kubernetes for service-mesh

name: elastic-fluend-kibana (EFK)
description: Enable logging aggregate from containers

name: Gitlab
description: distribute git repository, with gitlab can be used on gitlab saas or on-premise

name: Gitlab runner
description: agent to automate deployment using gitlab and git repository

name: Ansible
description: one of many tool for handle infrastructure as a code (IaC)

name: Helm
description: kubernetes package manager, to allow provision kubernetes resources

name: Kustomize
description: Kubernetes client templating, with this we can overlay yaml or json files

name: kubectl
description: Default kubernetes client to access cluster

name: Jenkis
description: Alternative gitlab ci for ci/cd workflow

name: Argo CD
description: Alternative gitlab ci for gitops workflow

name: Gitlab kubernetes integration (certificate based)
description: Allow deploy kubernetes resources using gitlab ci/cd workflow

name: Gitlab kubernetes agent (gitlab-kas)

name: Docker Desktop
description: Docker for development, testing
